Data published by The World Bank
Data publisher's source Carbon Dioxide Information Analysis Center, Environmental Sciences Division, Oak Ridge National Laboratory, Tennessee, United States.

GDP measured in real 2011 int-$ PPP (Purchasing Power Parity) terms
